response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to you. After careful consideration and evaluation, I am confident that this product will not only meet but exceed your expectations. Given its significance to you, I propose a purchase price of $1,200,000. This amount reflects the product's true worth while allowing us to reach a fair compromise. I believe this offer presents an excellent chance for both of us to benefit from this exceptional item. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions regarding the product.", "product_price": 1200000}
